title: HomeAdvisor's Hunter Sees Top of Multi-Family in 2017 (Audio)
itunes:title: HomeAdvisor's Hunter Sees Top of Multi-Family in 2017 (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Brad Hunter, Chief Economist at HomeAdvisor, on Home Depot earnings, and an overview of home improvement and housing starts numbers.
